package service

import (
	"context"
	"gfAdmin/internal/model"
	"gfAdmin/internal/model/entity"
)

type (
	IPrintServer interface {
		GetPrintServerList(ctx context.Context, page int, limit int) (*[]entity.PrintServer, int, error)
		GetPrintServer(ctx context.Context, id int) (*entity.PrintServer, error)
		AddPrintServer(ctx context.Context, printServer *entity.PrintServer) error
		UpgradePrintServer(ctx context.Context, printServer *entity.PrintServer) error
		GetPrintServerByToken(ctx context.Context, token string) (*entity.PrintServer, error)
		// passport是序列号 token是登录秘钥 可通过服务器~客户端协商更新
		GetPrintServerByPassport(ctx context.Context, passport string) (*entity.PrintServer, error)
		DB_Auth(ctx context.Context, passport string, token string) error
		SetClientID(ctx context.Context, id string) error
		Get(ctx context.Context) *model.ContextPrintServer
	}
)

var (
	localPrintServer IPrintServer
)

func PrintServer() IPrintServer {
	if localPrintServer == nil {
		panic("implement not found for interface IPrintServer, forgot register?")
	}
	return localPrintServer
}

func RegisterPrintServer(i IPrintServer) {
	localPrintServer = i
}
